br.com.caelum.vraptor.restfulie.hypermedia
Interface HypermediaResource

All Known Subinterfaces:
ConfigurableHypermediaResource
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConfigurableHypermediaResource
public interface HypermediaResource

Basic restfulie implementation: use this interface to implement and let the serializer know which are the possible followign relations from this object's state.

Since:
3.0.3
Author:
guilherme silveira, caires vinicius
